name: anger
quote: I don't like anybody to be angry with me. I'd rather have friends.

name: anger
quote: Holding on to anger is like grasping a hot coal with the intent of throwing it at someone else, you are the one who gets burned.

name: anger
quote: For every minute you remain angry, you give up sixty seconds of peace of mind.

name: anger
quote: There are two things a person should never be angry at, what they can help, and what they cannot.

name: contempt
quote: Whatever you hold in contempt is your jailer.

name: contempt
quote: The only cure for contempt is counter-contempt.

name: contempt
quote: To confer dignity, forgive. To express contempt, forget.

name: contempt
quote: When you're being mean to someone, you can feel the audience just get cold.

name: contempt
quote: People are not mean to us because they don’t like us, but because they don’t like themselves.

name: disgust
quote: Disgust is a learned behaviour that finds fertile soil in ignorance, yielding a bountiful harvest of alienation, oppression, and hate.

name: disgust
quote: You have to be disgusted with your current circumstances before your circumstances can change.

name: disgust
quote: We are disgusted by the things that we desire, and we desire what disgusts us.

name: fear
quote: Nothing in life is to be feared, it is only to be understood. Now is the time to understand more, so that we may fear less.

name: fear
quote: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.

name: fear
quote: Without fear there cannot be courage.

name: happiness
quote: To be happy, we must not be too concerned with others.

name: happiness
quote: If you want to be happy, be.

name: happiness
quote: If you want to be happy, set a goal that commands your thoughts, liberates your energy, and inspires your hopes.

name: neutral
quote: Always be yourself, express yourself, have faith in yourself, do not go out and look for a successful personality and duplicate it.

name: neutral
quote: Unexpressed emotions will never die. They are buried alive and will come forth later in uglier ways.

name: neutral
quote: Everyone has their own ways of expression. I believe we all have a lot to say, but finding ways to say it is more than half the battle.

name: sadness
quote: Don’t cry because it’s over, smile because it happened.

name: sadness
quote: The best way to cheer yourself up is to try to cheer somebody else up.

name: sadness
quote: Learn to let go. That is the key to happiness.

name: surprise
quote: No matter who you think you are
person: there is always another version waiting to show up.

name: surprise
quote: Even when all is lost and your faith has weakened, life will still surprise you.

name: surprise
quote: Blessed are they who expect nothing, for they will be pleasantly surprised.
